name: Rocket dodger
description:
Early prototype and little playground for my ideas!

Need to get myself back into a shape. So I did a little project.

This is a little action game where you should to dodge enemy rockets and score points for every exploded rocket. 

Main goal is to make playable and enjoyable game. 

Controls:

AD - rotation (PC) 

or

Tap left or right side of the screen to rotate ship. (Mobile) 

TODO list (no particular order): 
  • Savable score
  • Sound effects
  • Android release and some changes to sprites because they look small 
  • Power-ups
  • Rocket spawn indicators
  • Some kind of god of war shop
  • Learn to make shaders
  • Parallax background - Done!
  • Animations - Done!
  • Mobile HTML support - Done!
  • New types of enemies (maybe it also counts as difficulty increase) - Done! 1x

Any bug reports (if exists) are welcome!
